channel.title: software on Swaha Bhattacharya
channel.description: Recent content in software on Swaha Bhattacharya

item.title: complexR R Package
item.description: An R data package that provides functions to easily compute and visualize complex transformations and stereographic projections.

item.title: Community College Attendance in Massachusetts
item.description: In March 2023, the Healey-Driscoll administration proposed the MassReconnect program in their budget recommendation for the Fiscal Year 2024. The programaims to make community college free for students aged 25 and older. Keeping this in mind, my team and I created two visualisations to get an insight on POC attendance at community colleges in the state.

item.title: ipl R Package
item.description: An R data package that provides data and functions related to the Indian Premier League (IPL) matches and standard cricket statistics. This package allows users to avail of IPL data and conduct analysis of cricketers and IPL teams using functions of this package.

item.title: moderndive R Package
item.description: The moderndive R package consists of datasets and functions for tidyverse-friendly introductory linear regression. These tools leverage the well-developed tidyverse and broom packages to facilitate.
